channel.title: Code on Archie
channel.description: Recent content in Code on Archie

item.title: Syntax Higlighters
item.description: Python def sum(a,b): return a+b print(f'The Sum of 4 and 5 is {sum(4,5)}') JavaScript const sum = (a,b)=>{ return a+b } console.log(sum(4,5)) Go package main import ( "fmt" ) func addition(a int, b int) int { return a + b } func main() { x := addition(4, 5) fmt.Println(x) }
